achievements: Pioneer of progressive rock and power pop
Known for albums like 'Something/Anything?' and 'A Wizard, a True Star'
Influential figure in music technology and production
Co-creator of the Spawn comic book series
Founded Image Comics, a major independent comic publisher
Renowned for his dynamic and detailed art style
NFL Offensive Player of the Year (2017)
Led the NFL in rushing touchdowns (2017)
Led the development of major video game franchises like The Elder Scrolls and Fallout
Known for his innovative gameplay mechanics and immersive world-building
